details: Added --cov=ai-content-agents flag to measure coverage for the ai-content-agents module
Added --cov-report=term-missing to display missing lines in terminal output
Added --cov-fail-under=70 to enforce minimum 70% coverage requirement and fail tests if not met
file_insights.significance: Critical - Establishes automated coverage enforcement mechanism

patterns_discovered.description: Implementation of automated coverage checks in pytest configuration rather than external CI/CD pipeline
patterns_discovered.implication: Coverage requirements are now validated locally during test execution, failing the test suite if threshold is not met

patterns_discovered.description: Using pytest.ini to define and enforce code quality metrics
patterns_discovered.implication: Quality standards are centralized and version-controlled, ensuring consistency across development environments

gotchas_discovered.description: The --cov flag requires pytest-cov plugin to be installed
gotchas_discovered.risk: Tests will fail if pytest-cov is not present in the development environment

gotchas_discovered.description: Coverage is configured to measure only ai-content-agents module
gotchas_discovered.risk: Other project modules or test utilities may not be included in coverage metrics, potentially giving false sense of coverage completeness

gotchas_discovered.description: 70% threshold is strict and --cov-fail-under=70 will prevent test suite completion
gotchas_discovered.risk: May block PR merges or deployments if coverage drops even slightly below threshold without review flexibility

approach_outcome.result: Test coverage verification automated in pytest configuration, enforcing 70% minimum coverage requirement

recommendations.recommendation: Document pytest-cov dependency in project README or requirements file
recommendations.rationale: Ensure all team members have necessary dependencies installed to run tests with coverage verification

recommendations.recommendation: Verify coverage report output during local test runs
recommendations.rationale: The --cov-report=term-missing flag helps identify which lines lack coverage; teams should review this output

recommendations.recommendation: Consider implementing a gradual coverage increase strategy
recommendations.rationale: 70% is a starting point; establish a plan to incrementally increase the threshold to improve code quality over time

recommendations.recommendation: Exclude generated or third-party code from coverage if applicable
recommendations.rationale: Refine the --cov=ai-content-agents parameter if certain modules should not contribute to coverage metrics
